      • find

        public ClimateModel find(java.lang.Integer id)
                  throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the region in the database associated to a unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required climate model
        Returns:
        the climate model associated to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • find

        @Transactional
public ClimateModel find(java.lang.String name)
                  throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve a climate model in the Database by its name.
        Parameters:
        name: - the name of the climate model to retrieve
        Returns:
        the climate model matching the given name
        Throws:
        NoResultException: - if no climate model with the given name is found in the database
        javax.persistence.NoResultException

public ClimateModel findByCode(java.lang.String code)
                        throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve a climate model in the Database by its code.
        Parameters:
        code: - the code of the climate model to retrieve
        Returns:

        Throws:
        NoResultException: - if no climate model with the given code is found in the database
